arts.ttl: Bologna vs Pisa: three points needed
arts.sum: The official previous meetings in Bologna between the two teams are 10: 4 Emilian (Bologna) wins, 4 draws, 2 nerazzurri (Pisa) victories. Pisa is, together with Lecce, Genoa, Fiorentina and Verona, one of the Serie A 2025/26 teams still searching for their first league victory.
